hint: Apply safe filter pushdowns, convert implicit joins to explicit JOIN syntax, and pre-filter selective dimension tables to reduce early join cardinality.
Isolate date and dimension filters into CTEs, use explicit joins, and consider materializing selective dimension subsets before joining with large fact tables.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact subsets into CTEs, restructure the two fact-table pattern (store_sales/web_sales) as separate pre-aggregations, then combine.
Transform the dual fact-table join pattern using conditional aggregation in a single scan, or restructure the date range join (d2 between d1 and d1+30) using a lateral join or window function.
